setting.title: Member details
setting.roleDesc: Manager is able to invite members and access member settings.
setting.givePlansDesc: A plan needs to be allocated to use the product.

nickname.title: Nickname
nickname.caution: Enter 20 characters or less. Use Korean English special characters (excluding (>), (<)) and spaces.
nickname.fail: Failed to edit your nickname please try again later

password.title: Password
password.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to include at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
password.fail: Failed to update your password please try again later.

message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated to Workspace Members.
message.updateFail: Failed to update member details from the Workspace please try again later.
message.notChangeMasterPlan: Master's plan can only be changed by the Master.

kick.title: Remove Member from Workspace
kick.desc: Selected Members were removed from your Workspace. They are no longer be able to use Workspace-related products and services. Removed members can be invited again.

message.kickFail: Failed to remove Workspace Member please try again later

password.title: Reset password
password.desc: Resetting the password of selected Workspace account.
password.caution:
Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to include at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.

message.fail: Failed to change a password, please try again later.

delete.title: Delete account
delete.desc: Deleted the selected Member account. The uploaded data from the deleted account will not be deleted and only account-related information will be deleted. Deleted data cannot be recovered.

message.fail: Failed to delete the account, please try again later.

add.title: Add Workspace Members
add.desc: Workspace Member invitation email will be sent to the email address you entered. A Member is added if this Member accepts the invitation. You can allocate plans whenever you prefer from the [Member settings].

message.inviteFail: Failed to invite a Member to Workspace please try again later.
message.inviteSuccess: Invitation email has been sent. Member is added when Member accepts your invitation.
message.notHaveAnyPlan: At least one plan must be allocated when inviting new Workspace Members.
message.enoughPlan: No plans available to assign to Workspace Members - please purchase plans and invite them again.
message.memberOverflow: Please contact us if you would like add more Members to the Workspace. Contact
message.workspaceOverflow: Public service - one user can participate in up to 9 Workspaces. To join the selected Workspace, please leave one of the Workspaces you are in and request an invitation. email to the Workspace Master Member.
message.memberAlready: Cannot invite a Member who has already participated in the Workspace.
message.noHavePlans: No remaining plans available. Please go to the payment center and purchase the plans.
message.memberWithdrawal: Email accounts with a history of withdrawal cannot be invited.

invitation.title: Personal account invitation
invitation.desc: Do you want to use VIRNECT products and services with other users?

create.title: Add Workspace Member
create.info: Information of account to be created
create.idPlaceholder: Enter the ID of the account to be created.
create.passwordPlaceholder: Please enter your password for the account to be created.
create.workspaceMemberDesc: Create your own Member account. Only registered accounts can only use the service through the registered Workspace.
create.workspaceTooltip: Current number of Members + number of additional Members /Workspace Member limit number

caution.createId:
Enter your ID and password to create a new Workspace Member account.
You must allocate at least one plan to create an account.
caution.validUserId: Choose between 4 and 20 English letters and numbers for the ID
caution.validId: Choose between 4 and 20 English letters and numbers for the <u>ID</u>.
caution.validPassword:
Password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to include at least 3 of following character types.
- Uppercase letter
- Lowercase letter
- Number
- Special character ( . ! @ # $ % ).
Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
caution.canModify: Logged in user can change the password and account details updated during account registration.

message.successContent: Account was created based on the information entered. The account can be used with this information. Please let the user know of set up for the password recovery questions to proceed.
message.idDuplicated: ID is already registered, please enter a different ID.
message.notCheckId: There is an account using this ID is already in use.
message.notHaveAnyPlan: You must allocate at least one plan to the account.
message.fail: Failed to add a Member, please try again later. If the same problem occurs, please contact a network administrator.
message.addedId: This is the ID included in the account creation list. Please enter a different ID.

guest.title: Add Workspace Guest
guest.desc:
Guest Members are granted access to products by assigning plans like other members.
Anyone can use the service below through the guest.
guest.removeDesc: Users who are not logged participating in to an open session will require a link to access it. A Remote Plan is required to add guest.
guest.viewDesc: Open content is downloaded and experienced by non-login users.
